issues.title: Missing HTML lang attribute
issues.description: The <html> element does not have a lang attribute

issues.title: Images missing alt text
issues.description: 1 images do not have alt text
issues.suggestion: Add descriptive alt attributes to all images. For decorative images, use alt=""

issues.title: Color contrast issues detected
issues.description: Found 5 elements with potentially insufficient contrast
issues.suggestion: Ensure text has at least 4.5:1 contrast ratio (3:1 for large text). Use tools like WebAIM Contrast Checker.

issues.title: No loading states detected
issues.description: No visual loading indicators found on the page
issues.suggestion: Add loading spinners or skeleton screens for async operations

issues.title: No main navigation found
issues.description: Page does not have a <nav> or [role="navigation"] element
issues.suggestion: Add a <nav> element with main navigation links

issues.title: Links without accessible text
issues.description: 1 links have no visible text or aria-label
issues.suggestion: Add descriptive text or aria-label to all links

issues.title: No skip link found
issues.description: Page lacks a "skip to main content" link for keyboard users
issues.suggestion: Add a skip link as the first focusable element: Skip to main content
